Well
Automated commits are the nicest thing to do friday eves 
& the worst =
thing to discover monday mornings.

Thomas,

  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: Mark Derricutt 
  To: junit@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, De=
cember 20, 2001 7:26 PM
  Subject: Re: [junit] Running Ant and Junit in Vis=
ual Age


  If its Ant plugin is so nice, why is it that it can't run any o=
f my ant 
  scripts :( Does anyone know what version of Ant it uses?  I als=
o HATE the 
  cvs client, it sure looks great, but in order to just commit =
it sat there 
  for ages cheking every single file if they needed to be upd=
ated.  Tookway 
  too much time :(

  Mark

01 07:13:18 -0800 Joshua Kerievsky

  >=
